amendment.description: To exempt military personnel from certain personnel transfer authorities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3809 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice.

action.text: Amendment SA 3809 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S10321-10324; text as modified: CR S10322) To exempt military personnel from certain personnel transfer authorities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3809 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3809 proposed by Senator Levin.
